privacy.intro: HiTravel takes the privacy of its users seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect personal information gathered when you use our site.
privacy.title: Collected Information
privacy.description: Our site collects personal information (such as name, email, phone number, etc.) solely for the purpose of providing services. By voluntarily providing this information, the user consents to the collection and processing of this data.
privacy.description1: The information we collect may be used to personalize the user experience, process requests, and inform users about promotions and services.
privacy.description2: HiTravel does not share, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, data sharing may be necessary due to legal obligations.
privacy.description3: Our website may use cookies to enhance the user experience. Cookies are small data files stored by your browser.
privacy.description4: The security of your personal information is important to us, and appropriate security measures are in place to protect this data.
privacy.description5: Any changes to this privacy policy will take effect immediately upon being posted on our website.
privacy.description6: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us

term.intro: These terms of use govern access to and use of the Hi Travel website (www.hitravel.com.tr). By using our site, you agree to the terms outlined below.
term.title: Access and Use of the Site
term.description: Hi Travel allows users to access and use the website, but access must be in accordance with the laws and these terms of use.
term.description1: Hi Travel offers tourism services, including hotel bookings, tour sales, and provides information and transactions related to other services.
term.description2: All content, graphics, logos, software, text, and other materials on the site are owned by Hi Travel and are protected by copyright. These materials may not be used without permission.
term.description3: Hi Travel makes no guarantees regarding the accuracy or uninterrupted availability of the information and services on the site. Any damages resulting from the use of services are the user's responsibility.
term.description4: Hi Travel reserves the right to make changes to these terms of use at any time. Changes will take effect as soon as they are reflected on the site.
term.description5: You can contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
term.description6: These terms of use are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. In case of any disputes, the courts of Antalya have jurisdiction.

distance.intro: This agreement regulates remote sales transactions made through Hi Travel. The buyer is deemed to have accepted the following terms for any service purchases made on the Hi Travel site.
distance.title: Parties
distance.desc1: Seller: HiTravel. Buyer: The person or company purchasing the service.
distance.desc2: The seller will provide the tourism services specified to the buyer. The price of the services is valid as specified at the time of the order.
distance.desc3: Payments will be made by the buyer using the payment methods specified on the site. The seller cannot provide any service without confirming the payment transaction.
distance.desc4: The buyer may exercise the right of withdrawal within 14 days. However, the right to withdraw may be limited for certain services, such as tours.
distance.desc5: In the event of a cancellation of purchased services, a refund will be provided in accordance with the cancellation policy.

shipping.title: Parties
shipping.desc: This agreement is electronically concluded between Hi Travel Turizm Ticaret Ltd. ≈ûti. (Seller) and the person (Buyer) who purchases services such as tours, hotels, car rentals, etc. via the website hitravel.com.tr.
shipping.desc2: This agreement regulates the delivery and return conditions of the services ordered by the Buyer through the Seller‚Äôs website hitravel.com.tr.
shipping.desc3: The services purchased by the Buyer become valid upon confirmation of the reservation made through the system. Delivery takes place electronically by sending the reservation document, voucher, ticket, or other digital documents to the Buyer, depending on the type of service. There is no physical product delivery.
shipping.desc4: When the Buyer wishes to cancel the reservation, cancellation conditions vary depending on the nature of the service. The cancellation period and refund policy for hotel, tour, or transfer services are specified in the service description and during the reservation. Cancellations and refunds may not be possible for promotional or special campaign services. Such conditions will be communicated to the Buyer in advance. No cancellations or refunds are accepted after the service has started. In case of cancellations caused by supplier companies, a full refund is provided or an equivalent service is offered to the Buyer.
shipping.desc5: The Buyer has the right of withdrawal under distance sales contracts; however, according to the Consumer Protection Law No. 6502, the right of withdrawal does not apply to services such as accommodation, transportation, and food and beverage supply that are performed on a specific date or period.
shipping.desc6: The Buyer acknowledges that they have read, understood, and approved this agreement. The Seller reserves the right to change the terms of the agreement without prior notice.
shipping.desc7: In case of disputes arising from this agreement, Consumer Arbitration Committees and Consumer Courts located in the Buyer‚Äôs residence area, within the limits announced by the Ministry of Trade of the Republic of Turkey, are authorized.
shipping.help: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us:

refund.tur: Cancellation and Refund Policy for Tours
refund.desc1: The right to free cancellation for tours is valid for cancellations made at least 14 days before the tour date. After the free cancellation period, cancellation fees will apply.
refund.desc2: Cancellations made 7 to 14 days before the tour date are subject to a cancellation fee of 50% of the tour price. For cancellations made 7 days or less before the tour date, no full refund will be issued. A cancellation fee of 100% of the tour price may be charged.
refund.desc3: Refunds are processed according to the cancellation policy set by the tour company. Cancellation requests must be made in writing (via email or customer service). The refund process begins after approval from the tour company and usually takes 7-14 business days to complete.
refund.desc4: In the case of tour cancellations due to force majeure (natural disasters, pandemics, etc.), payment may be refunded or an alternative date may be offered. You must contact customer service for a refund request.
refund.villa: Cancellation and Refund Policy for Villas
refund.desc5: The right to free cancellation for villas is valid for cancellations made at least 15 days before the reservation date. Cancellations made within this period will receive a full refund.
refund.desc6: Cancellations made 7 to 15 days before the reservation date are subject to a cancellation fee of 50% of the total villa amount. Cancellations made 7 days or less before the reservation date will not be refunded.
refund.desc7: Refunds are processed according to the conditions set during the booking and the policies of the villa provider. The cancellation must be made in writing and approved by customer service. The refund process usually takes 7-14 business days to complete.
refund.desc8: In case of villa cancellation due to pandemic, natural disasters, or other force majeure circumstances, the reservation may be postponed to another date or the payment refunded. You must contact customer service for such situations.
refund.desc9: Cancellation and refund conditions may vary for each tour and villa. Therefore, please carefully check the specific conditions for each service before booking. It is important to notify cancellation requests in writing (via email). Refunds will be made via the method of payment used, and the process will be monitored by customer service.

faq.desc: We have compiled answers to questions you might have while planning your trip.
faq.s1: How do I make a reservation on Hi Travel?
faq.a1: You can quickly make a reservation by selecting the date and number of people in the search field on our website.
faq.a2: Yes, certain services have specific cancellation policies. Cancellation and refund conditions vary depending on the type of service. To cancel your reservation, you can contact customer service.
faq.a3: Hi Travel provides travel insurance services for users. For information about travel insurance and to purchase a policy, please contact customer service.
faq.s4: Which countries do not require a visa for Turkish citizens?
faq.a4: Countries where Turkish citizens can travel without a visa include Georgia, Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Montenegro, Kosovo, Japan, South Korea, Maldives, Thailand, Tunisia, and Morocco. It is recommended to check based on the target country for details.
faq.s5: Is breakfast included in the room price?
faq.a5: Breakfast is generally not included in the price of Hi Travel villas, as villas provide independent accommodation options, and guests can prepare their meals in the kitchen. However, some villas may offer breakfast as an extra service or provide private chef services. You can check whether breakfast is included and learn about extra service options during the reservation process or by contacting customer service.
faq.s6: Is a guiding service provided for tours?
faq.a6: Yes, most of our tours are conducted with professional guides. Our guides provide detailed information about the places visited and answer your questions.
faq.s7: Can I change the date or number of people in my reservation?
faq.a7: Yes, it is possible to change the details of your reservation. However, changes depend on the service provider and the cancellation/refund policies of the reservation. To make changes, please contact customer service.
faq.a8: Hi Travel applies a specific policy for reservation changes or cancellations. Generally, you must request cancellation or changes within a certain period. This period and conditions vary depending on villa rentals and tour packages. Early cancellations often allow refunds, while last-minute changes or cancellations may require full payment. For detailed cancellation and change policies, please contact Hi Travel customer service before or after your reservation.
faq.s8: What happens if I need to make changes or cancel my reservation? Do you have a cancellation policy?
faq.a9: Do you offer discounted tickets or special services for children?
faq.s9: Yes, you can view discounted ticket options for children through Hi Travel. Additionally, you can get information about special services or reservation options that provide extra comfort for children.

Villa.title: Early Booking Opportunities at Hi Travel

activity.intro: Hi Travel offers all your travel needs in one place to help you experience the holiday of your dreams. Whether you're looking for a relaxing seaside vacation, thrilling adventures, or a comfortable stay at a luxury resort, Hi Travel has something for everyone!
activity.title: Tours and Travel Packages
activity.desc: Global tours, cultural trips, adventure-filled explorations, and nature vacations for every type of traveler.
activity.desc2: A wide range of hotel options, from beachfront resorts to boutique hotels close to city centers, catering to all budgets.
activity.desc3: The best flight options, convenient transportation choices, and easy airport transfers to make your journey smoother.
activity.desc4: Special packages for family vacations, honeymoons, romantic getaways, and group trips with friends.
activity.desc5: Plan your vacation with the best deals, early booking discounts, and seasonal promotions tailored to your budget.
activity.title6: Experience the Difference with Hi Travel
activity.desc6: With fast and easy bookings, secure and seamless travel, and a wide selection of destinations, experience the Hi Travel difference.
activity.help: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us:
